column2: My squiddy informants brought a surprise.[~]They said that you are currently plotting my untimely demise.
What?! But those guys haven’t even got any mouths on ’em!
Just who do you think you’re talking to, dear?
You’ll find I’m far more resourceful than I appear.[~]Ahhh ha ha ha ha!
But as I was saying. When I help you out and get [f2]this[/f] kind of thanking...[~]then you leave me with no choice but to start doling out spankings.
